## FlyoutSeparator.moveBy() method

Repositions this separator.

**Signature:**

```typescript
moveBy(dx: number, dy: number, _reason?: string[]): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dx | number | The distance to move this separator on the X axis. |
|  dy | number | The distance to move this separator on the Y axis. |
|  \_reason | string\[\] | _(Optional)_ The reason this move was initiated. |

**Returns:**

void
